blog.name: inklingleesquidly
blog.title:
(+++++LEE SQUIDLY+++++)
★THE STAR SCOUT★
blog.description:
The splat-tastic adventures of mild mannered Inkling boy, Lee Squidly , his friends, and his ever-loving mom, Janine. Come for commissioned art, fashions, pics from Booyah Base, and  lots more. Ask the Squidlys any questions you like, they love the company and making new friends.
SWITCH FC: 7050-8035-7249
My NNID: Squall_Lee

summary: ART by and featuring @flameeliwoodart's Amber Ashes.   When your friend is a North Pacific Giant Squid, you're bound to have...

ART by and featuring @flameeliwoodart’s Amber Ashes.

blog.title: Asks: CLOSED! Submissions: OPEN!
blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Talking out of character))

Hello there! I’m Professor Sakura, and I’m always willing

to help trainers and caretakers with their Pokemon.

You can ask me about Pokemon behavior, where certain Pokemon can be found,

and even report sightings of rare or mythical Pokemon.

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: So... good news, got away from the blue blur thing. Bad news, I got a angry lati after me. Probably to do with the previous...
question: So... good news, got away from the blue blur thing. Bad news, I got a angry lati after me. Probably to do with the previous crash. How would I go about getting the thing that calm down enough to not get attacked on site?
answer:
You need to stay calm and not make any sudden movements or noises. You’ll have to speak in a quiet voice and reassure them that you won’t hurt them.

- Professor Sakura

reblog.comment:
You need to stay calm and not make any sudden movements or noises. You’ll have to speak in a quiet voice and reassure them that you won’t hurt them.

- Professor Sakura

- Professor Sakura
trail.content:

summary: Fact on Swampert? Do they love mud as much as marshtomp and mudkip?
question: Fact on Swampert? Do they love mud as much as marshtomp and mudkip?
answer:
The entire Mudkip line loves mud. As for some facts:

  • Swampert are omnivores with a preference towards fish.
  • Swampert have been observed letting smaller Pokémon into their nests when a storm is coming.
  • They’re often used to help boats that have gotten stuck. They’re strong enough to push the boat or pull it while swimming.
  • Like most amphibious Pokémon, Swampert have to keep their skin wet. They’ll often cover themselves in mud to keep from drying out.
  • The orange gills on the sides of their face can detect vibrations in the water, helping them track down prey.

- Professor Sakura

summary: I... might have met a Spiritomb in.. a sunk ship, totally isolated place (don't know how the guy was still ok) and.. well, catch...
question: I... might have met a Spiritomb in.. a sunk ship, totally isolated place (don't know how the guy was still ok) and.. well, catch it. ...I think it probably like me. ...Do you have any suggestion on what I should do or not? Or any in general? And do you think my espeon will go along with it..?
answer:
It sounds like the Spiritomb likes you, so I think you should keep it. They’re very powerful Pokémon. As for your Espeon, they should be fine, although they might be a bit wary at first.

- Professor Sakura

summary: DETECTIVE PIKACHU WRITERS REVEAL HOW THEY'D APPROACH A SMASH BROS. MOVIE
title: DETECTIVE PIKACHU WRITERS REVEAL HOW THEY'D APPROACH A SMASH BROS. MOVIE
body:
With Detective Pikachu now out at theaters, fans are already dreaming of what movies could be next. We know a Mario movie is coming, but what else could get greenlit? Could we eventually get to a time where a Smash Bros. movie happen? While that might be a pipe dream, the writers behind Detective Pikachu have shared how they’d pull off a film adaptation like that.

“I think that the key to doing anything like that is to make sure that the other introductory movies are sensational. It’d be a dream to write something like Legend of Zelda, but before you can get to that Smash Bros stage you have to write the best damn version of The Legend of Zelda that you possibly can. And the same with Mario, the same with Kirby, the same with Star Fox.” - Dan Hernandez

“Avengers: Endgame is only as good as it is because we loved all of those characters individually, so when it came together it was just magic. And I think that’s how you have to approach the Smash Bros.” - Benji Samit

summary: POKEMON GO 'DETECTIVE PIKACHU' LEAFLETS DISTRIBUTED IN JAPAN
title: POKEMON GO 'DETECTIVE PIKACHU' LEAFLETS DISTRIBUTED IN JAPAN
body: Sanspo has released some special Pokemon GO leaflets in Japan. The leaflets promote Detective Pikachu in Pokemon GO, and also promote the recently-released Detective Pikachu movie.

summary: POKÉMON ACTION AT THE ORIGINS GAME FAIR
title: POKÉMON ACTION AT THE ORIGINS GAME FAIR
body:
Pokémon Trainers can mark their calendars for the annual Origins Game Fair, held from June 12–16, 2019, at the Greater Columbus Convention Center in Columbus, Ohio. Look for the Pokémon booth in the fair’s gaming hall, which will feature activities for Pokémon Trading Card Game players and video game players alike.

Pokémon TCG fans can take part in a variety of events including a Build & Battle draft, Theme Deck Throwdowns, and TCG Cups and Challenges. Video game competitors can enjoy Premier Challenges, Midseason Showdowns, and a chance to earn badge cases from a Pokémon Professor.

The Origins Game Fair will also host the Origins Open for Pokémon TCG players. This Standard-format Special Event is open to all Origins Game Fair attendees, and top finishers will earn Championship Points toward an invitation to the Pokémon World Championships in August. Special Events such as this award Championship Points equivalent to those earned at a Regional Championships event. It’s a great way to put your deck to the test before the North America International Championships the following weekend!

Whether you’re competing in the Origins Open or just want to watch some of the best Pokémon TCG players around battle, the Origins Game Fair should prove exciting for everyone who swings by! Visit the Origins Game Fair official site for details and registration.

blog.description: (Just a simple rp blog,,,I do swear on here; be careful, kiddins!)

summary: If Nanu isn't really acting as Kahuna anymore, where do trainers get their starters on Ula'Ula?
question: If Nanu isn't really acting as Kahuna anymore, where do trainers get their starters on Ula'Ula?
answer:
We try to keep new trainers away from Po Town, so typically it’ll be either me or Acerola. When Nanu isn’t around Po Town and he’s close enough, he’ll give one to them.

-Professor Ebony

reblog.comment:

-Professor Ebony

summary: SONGBIRD SYMPHONY 'MUSICAL' TRAILER RELEASED
title: SONGBIRD SYMPHONY 'MUSICAL' TRAILER RELEASED
body: In Songbird Symphony, you are able to influence the background music with your puzzle-solving skills! The more creatures of the forest’s different chapters you help out on your way, the more musical elements are added to the background until the perfect symphony is unlocked.
